# Spit Poison
## Overview
***The following spell is available to [[Hoyrall|hoyrall]] spellcasters at the GM’s discretion.***

**Level**: 2nd
#Spell-Level/2nd

**School**: Transmutation
#Spell-School/Transmutation

**Casting Time**: 1 action

**Range**: Self

**Components**: V, S, M (pinch of sulfur)

**Duration**: Instantaneous

## Effects
As part of the casting of this spell, you spit a glob of your poisonous blood at a target as a ranged spell attack. The magic of the spell changes your poison’s type to contact, and increases the DC to resist it by doubling your proficiency bonus. Casting this spell consumes 1 daily use of your poison blood.
